section.title: sales representatives creating new Sales Representative
section.para: To create a new Sales Representative, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Sales Representative, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter an identification number for the Sales Representative.
Select if the Sales Representative is currently active. Not selecting means the Sales Representative is inactive.
Enter the name of the Sales Representative.

varlistentry.term: sales representatives commission percentages for Comm. Prcnt

listitem.para: Enter the commission percentage for the Sales Representative. For example, if the commission is to be 5%, enter the value ".05".

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Sales Representative, returning you to the application desktop.
Creates the Sales Representative and enters their information into the master list of Sales Representatives.
